title: ‘I Was Scared, Uncertain … I Hit Breaking Point’: Demi Vollering Opens up on Agony of Tour de France Unraveling
content:
Dutch superstar doesn't shy away from revealing her suffering in quest to open the conversation about mental health in elite sport.

Read the full article at ‘I Was Scared, Uncertain … I Hit Breaking Point’: Demi Vollering Opens up on Agony of Tour de France Unraveling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
